monsterLanguages: Languages understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can't speak
monsterSpecials: Undead Fortitude. If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.
monsterActions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage.
Eye Ray. The zombie uses a random magical eye ray, choosing a target that it can see within 60 feet of it.
